actionConfiguration.body:
select ((SELECT count(cd_id) FROM public.course_theory_track where section_id = q2.section_id and chapter_tag = q2.chapter_tag)*100/
		(select count(cd_id) from  public.topic_detail_master where chapter_tag = q2.chapter_tag))as percentage_completed,* from(


select  q1.school_name,q1.std,q1.section,q1.section_id,q1.subject_id,q1.subject_name ,q1.chapter_tag,q1.chapter_name,q1.cd_id,q1.chapter,tdm.cd_name,
 concat('https://learnbasics.learnyst.com/admin/products/course-builder/',(select b1.ly_course_id from(
	 select  ly_course_id,subject_id,	unnest(section_id_list)as ly_section_id,  array_to_string(course_type, ',') as ly_course_type FROM app.ly_course_data)b1
	where b1.ly_section_id = q1.section_id and b1.subject_id = q1.subject_id and b1.ly_course_type like '%theory%' ))as url from(
		
	select  lsd.school_name,sci.std,sm.section,sm.section_id,submas.subject_id,submas.subject_name ,ctt.chapter_tag,cdm.chapter_name,
		concat(ctt.chapter_tag,' - ',cdm.chapter_name)as chapter,max(ctt.cd_id)as cd_id
	
from public.course_theory_track as ctt
	join  public.section_master as sm
		on ctt.section_id = sm.section_id
	join public.school_class_info as sci 
		on sm.class_id = sci.class_id
	join public.lb_school_details as lsd 
		on sci.school_id = lsd.school_id
	join public.subject_master as submas
		on ctt.subject_id = submas.subject_id
	join  public.topic_detail_master as tdm
		on ctt.chapter_tag = tdm.chapter_tag and ctt.cd_id = tdm.cd_id
	join  public.chapter_details_master as cdm
		on ctt.chapter_tag = cdm.chapter_tag 
		where ctt.end_date::date >={{DatePicker1.formattedDate}}
		group by lsd.school_name,sci.std,sm.section,submas.subject_name,ctt.chapter_tag,cdm.chapter_tag,cdm.chapter_name,sm.section_id,submas.subject_id)q1

join  public.topic_detail_master as tdm
		on q1.chapter_tag = tdm.chapter_tag and q1.cd_id = tdm.cd_id)q2
		order by school_name asc,std asc , section asc
-- 	join  public.chapter_details_master as cdm
-- 		on ctt.chapter_tag = cdm.chapter_tag
